data.description:
Stickball Fast Food Cashier is an engaging and interactive game that offers players a slice of life from the fast-paced world of fast food service. In this immersive simulation, you step into the shoes of a cashier at a bustling stickball-themed eatery. Your task is to manage a variety of duties that test your multitasking abilities and customer service skills.

As the game begins, you‚Äôre greeted with a vibrant and colorful interface, where stickball characters queue up to place their orders. Each character comes with a distinct personality and set of preferences, making every interaction unique and challenging. You‚Äôll need to be quick on your feet to take orders, process payments, and ensure each customer leaves satisfied.

The gameplay mechanics are straightforward yet addictive. You‚Äôll interact with an intuitive point-of-sale system, tapping and swiping to enter orders and handle cash. The difficulty ramps up with each level, introducing new menu items, complex orders, and even the occasional difficult customer. So put on your virtual apron, fire up the fryer, and get ready to become the best stickball fast food cashier out there! üéÆüçüüåü

changelog.change_log:
- Initial release of the game
- Experience the thrill of working at a Fast Food Restaurant
- Enjoy realistic physics and sound effects
Permissions:
- android.permission.RECORD_AUDIO: Required to enable voice chat with other players
- android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: Required to access the photos and videos stored on your device and use them as custom items in the game
- android.permission.ACCESS_MEDIA_LOCATION: Required to access the location metadata of the media files and use them to generate realistic lighting and shadows in the game
